name: Always Bee Moving
description:
Game made for GMTK 2020 by

  • Joshua Ansari - Programmer, Modeler, VFX
  • Jay Friso - Programmer
  • Sally Pang - Artist

Bees VS. Human, OH THE HUMANABEEEEEE.

Fight against the evil killer bees to win the battle for humanity.

In this FPBBS (First-Person-Bee-Battle-Simulator) jump around the trampoline honey comb colosseum and shoot at the killer bees jetpacks to stop them from their rampage. Try to survive as many waves as possible.

Hint : If your struggling, you must HIT THE JETPACKS. That is how you take down the bees!

We BEE LIEVE IN YOU.
